title: Chandler Braggin' on Beeps
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn kick off 2018 in chambers and ready to clear the docket! They talk about listening to songs on repeat, work attire, suitcase storage, a New England donut and coffee chain, and more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
